basics.name: Kaung Htet Naing
basics.label: Front-End Developer
basics.summary: I specialize in building responsive and scalable web applications using modern frontend technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.With a strong foundation in frontend frameworks like React and React Naitve, I have successfully delivered impactful projects that meet both client requirements and industry best practices.I have a keen eye for design and a deep understanding of UX principles, allowing me to collaborate effectively with designers to translate wireframes and mockups into pixel-perfect UIs.If you are looking for a dedicated and skilled frontend developer who is passionate about creating exceptional user interfaces, I would love to connect.. Let's discuss how we can work together to bring your web projects to life.

work.name: Company
highlights: Collaborated on stages of systems development lifecycle from requirement gathering to production releases.
Revised, modularized and updated old code bases to modern development standards, reducing operating costs, and improving functionality.
Developed Android and iOS applications for a leading Japanese coffee shop industry.
Utilized React Native to build and maintain a mobile application for the coffee shop.
Integrated Google Maps API to provide location-based services and enable users to find nearby coffee shops.
Collaborated closely with the backend team to ensure smooth API integration and data flow.
Implemented features such as user authentication, menu display, ordering system, and push notifications.

work.name: Digit House Co.,Ltd
highlights: Developed and designed a Myanmar fonts downloader website using Next.js.
Implemented intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for the website, allowing users to easily navigate and search for their desired fonts.
Integrated font preview and download functionality, enabling users to visualize and download fonts of their choice.
Worked on an e-commerce dashboard project, responsible for developing and designing real-time analytics, sales reports, and inventory management features.
Collaborated with the backend team to integrate the dashboard with necessary APIs and data sources, ensuring seamless data flow and accurate information display.
Designed interactive data visualizations, including charts and graphs, to present complex data in a clear and understandable format.
Developed product listing pages with filtering and sorting functionalities to enhance product discoverability.
Built a course download application that connects with GraphQL and the Strapi dashboard, allowing users to easily browse and download educational courses.
Ensured a smooth user experience through intuitive design, error handling, and validation.
Designed and updated layouts to meet usability and performance requirements.
